dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, wait, people are like, asking when this high-speed train from Astana to Almaty will launch, right? The one that could do it in, uh, ten hours?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, wait, people are like, asking when this high-speed train from Astana to Almaty will launch, right? The one that could do it in, uh, ten hours?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis periodically ask when the high-speed train from Astana to Almaty will be launched, which will be able to cover the distance between the cities in 10 hours.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's, that's what everyone, um, wants to know. That's the question.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's, that's what everyone, um, wants to know. That's the question.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But then the article says, like, it's not happening? Not yet?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then the article says, like, it's not happening? Not yet?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At present, taking into account these factors and the program for updating the car fleet, including new cars arriving today, it is not yet possible to cover the route from Astana to Almaty in 10 hours," the company told us.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely. The, uh, company, JSC Passenger Transportation, they've been pretty clear on that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely. The, uh, company, J S C Passenger Transportation, they've been pretty clear on that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We learned the answer to this question from the press service of JSC "Passenger Transportation".

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But why? I mean, what's the holdup? Is it, uh, money?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But why? I mean, what's the holdup? Is it, uh, money?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they actually point to a few things. First off, it's, you know, the condition of the railway track itself. The infrastructure, basically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they actually point to a few things. First off, it's, you know, the condition of the railway track itself. The infrastructure, basically.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company reminded that "the speed of the train depends primarily on the condition of the railway track, that is, the proper infrastructure."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The track? Like, it's not, um, good enough for that speed?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The track? Like, it's not, um, good enough for that speed?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. To run a train at, like, 200 kilometers per hour, you need a really, really robust track system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. To run a train at, like, two hundred kilometers per hour, you need a really, really robust track system.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the age of the cars is taken into account, which can move at a speed of 200 kilometers per hour and higher.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so infrastructure. What else? Do they not have enough trains?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so infrastructure. What else? Do they not have enough trains?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, kinda. It's about, um, the locomotives ready to pull, like, twenty or more cars. And the demand is super high, so you need a lot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, kinda. It's about, um, the locomotives ready to pull, like, twenty or more cars. And the demand is super high, so you need a lot.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As well as the availability of locomotives ready to transport a train of 20 or more cars, given the high demand for the route.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, the, uh, engines. Anything else slowing it down?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, the, uh, engines. Anything else slowing it down?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm. The age of the actual passenger cars. They need to be able to, like, handle those speeds too, which many don't currently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm. The age of the actual passenger cars. They need to be able to, like, handle those speeds too, which many don't currently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the age of the cars is taken into account, which can move at a speed of 200 kilometers per hour and higher.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The cars? So, not just the track and the engine, but, uh, the actual carriages matter?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The cars? So, not just the track and the engine, but, uh, the actual carriages matter?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And with all those factors, they're saying it's just, you know, not possible right now for ten hours.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And with all those factors, they're saying it's just, you know, not possible right now for ten hours.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At present, taking into account these factors and the program for updating the car fleet, including new cars arriving today, it is not yet possible to cover the route from Astana to Almaty in 10 hours," the company told us.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, what's the, uh, fastest option then, if not this ten-hour dream?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what's the, uh, fastest option then, if not this ten-hour dream?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right now, the Talgo, that can get you there in, um, about seventeen hours and five minutes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right now, the Talgo, that can get you there in, um, about seventeen hours and five minutes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is noteworthy that, for example, Talgo can take you from Astana to Almaty in 17 hours and 5 minutes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Seventeen hours? Oh, man, that's, uh, a lot longer than ten.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seventeen hours? Oh, man, that's, uh, a lot longer than ten.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, quite a bit. And they also said, um, no plans for this faster train in the coming years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, quite a bit. And they also said, um, no plans for this faster train in the coming years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The press service also clarified that there are no plans to launch such a train in the coming years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No plans. Wow. Okay. That's, uh, that's a tough pill.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No plans. Wow. Okay. That's, uh, that's a tough pill.
